**Tender Announcement: Powerex SEQ2007HP Compressor**

**Reference Number:** WS3645976828-Doc3658165680

**End User:** Department of the Environment (ECCC)

**Contact Information:**
- **Name:** Mike Littlefield (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** [mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description:**
Canada Centre for Inland Waters in Burlington, Ontario has a requirement for the supply, delivery, and commissioning of one Powerex SEQ2007HP compressor to form part of an existing fail-safe system comprising three identical compressors. The acquisition objective is to ensure reliable and efficient operation of the system. The contract start date is expected to be October 6, 2022, and the end date is May 31, 2023.

**Delivery Terms:**
The deliverables are expected to be received on or before March 23, 2023. Bidders are responsible for submitting all required supporting documentation and bid submissions on or before October 3, 2022, at 14:00 EDT. Any bids submitted after the mentioned deadline will be considered non-responsive.
